Hangout.Server.WebServices.PayPalCallBackHandler

Hangout.Server.WebServices.PayPalCallBackHandler Class Reference

This implements the callback method from PayPal to complete the purchase process. This functions expects the XML result from the callback page in the following form: There are 3 return types: PaypalReturn ==> succesfully charged the card. PaypalCancel ==> user canceled the transaction PaypalRecurring ==> a recurring transaction was succesfully initiated. In each case the twofish service needs to be called to comlete the transaction. The parameters used to call twofish are the return paramaters from the callback. More...

 PayPalCallBackHandler (string loggerName)
XmlDocument PayPalCallBack (string xmlResult)
 Callback method used by PayPal.

Detailed Description

This implements the callback method from PayPal to complete the purchase process. This functions expects the XML result from the callback page in the following form: There are 3 return types: PaypalReturn ==> succesfully charged the card. PaypalCancel ==> user canceled the transaction PaypalRecurring ==> a recurring transaction was succesfully initiated. In each case the twofish service needs to be called to comlete the transaction. The parameters used to call twofish are the return paramaters from the callback.

Return Values: Key: userId Value: 545 Key: offerId Value: 29 Key: externalTxnId Value: 954a9f42-1df9-4e16-bf56-5b8abcc7611e Key: token Value: EC-57K58313BY1773505 Key: PayerID Value: 8FBU5YKUF3MM6

Returns:
